name: Delicious - Emily's Hopes & Fears
summary: Delicious - Emily's Hopes and Fears Deluxe takes you on an adventure like no other before... During the hottest summer of the century, Paige fights to survive a mysterious disease. While Emily stays unwaveringly by her struggling daughter’s side, Patrick embarks on an epic journey through the blistering cold in search of the only cure: a magical flower… Can he save his little girl?
info:
